sentences.sContent: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.sContent: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.sCn: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.sContent: He was tall, dark, and handsome.
sentences.sCn: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.sContent: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
She didn’t speak to anyone and nobody spoke to her.
sentences.sCn: 她不跟别人说话，也没人跟她说话。

phrases.pCn: 还有别的；还不止这些；比这个还要多
等等；的确；此外；连…一齐都
[美国英语](工资以外)供给膳宿[亦作 all found]
反之亦然；反过来也一样
诸如此类（等于and 等等（等于what have you）；what have you或what not）
[口语]等等[见 what 中的 what have you ]

trans.tranOther: used to join two words, phrases etc referring to things that are related in some way
used before saying the part of a large number which is less than 100
